summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1224, for the improvement of Summit Avenue North, from Denny Way to East Thomas Street, all in the City of Seattle, by constructing a sewer therein of proper dimensions, together with the necessary catch basins, wyes, manholes and inlets, under Ordinance No. 13419, and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
